QuestData.Title: A Taste of Freedom
QuestData.Description:
We are as ready as we will ever be. Once we put Valtrois' plan into action, we can attack the Sanctum of Order and put an end to Andaris. She will never expect us to have trained our withered against fel magic, and her hubris will be her downfall.
Come, let us feed the people one last time.
QuestData.LogDescription: Feed the Fruit of the Arcan'dor to a Suramar Refugee in Shal'Aran.
